author: George Bowden
title: Rotherham Labour MPs Win Libel Action Against Ukip MEP

text:
Rotherham Labour MPs Win Libel Action Against Ukip MEP Developing news this afternoon. George Bowden Reporter at The Huffington Post UK HuffPost 
Rotherham’s three Labour MPs have each won £54,000 High Court libel damages from Ukip MEP Jane Collins over remarks she made about the town’s child abuse scandal. 
Sir Kevin Barron, MP for Rother Valley, John Healey, MP for Wentworth and Dearne, and Sarah Champion, MP for Rotherham sued MEP Jane Collins, who represents Yorkshire and North Lincolnshire. 
The High Court case was brought after Collins made comments at the Ukip party conference in September 2014. This is a breaking news story and will be updated. Check back for the fullest version. Follow The Huffington Post UK on Twitter here , and on Facebook here . More:
